post.text:
As a candidate, Trump has already embarrassed us on the world stage.

Imagine the damage he'd do as president.

comment.author: Craig
comment.text: "Well, let me put it this way: I terminated her, along with some other staff members who were — were no longer needed, and advised her that I would not — could not — recommend her for any further positions." When pressed, Zeifman said he couldn't recommend Hillary Rodham Clinton for future positions, "Because of her unethical conduct" still the same HROC

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: I sure wish the FBI would investigate the true crime. Trumps $25,000 bribe to the Florida Attorney General, to not file charges on his fraudulent, and corrupt tRUMP university... Crooked Don the Con.
